summary:
Egads that stupid hood: finally gone!
Chose from simple (that merely removes the hood)
...and natural (that makes her look like a normal dunmer)
descriptionHtml:
Think Karliah\'s thieves guild hood looks hideous? No? Well I as sure do, so I made a basic modifer for Karliah to remove it.
Sadly no, there is no change to the strange hoarse whisper-voice she uses for some reason. That is a mystery.



====REQUIRES====
Only basic Skyrim. (It doesn\'t even use the update.esm file.)

====INSTALLATION====
Plop the .esp of your choosing into your Data folder and enable. Tada!


====WHAT IT DOES====
There are two versions:
\'Simple\' modifies only her Outfit file, so any mods on Karliah herself will be fine. Her face is unmodified. She is using her original hair. She still has the blurple eyes.
If you are using mods that change the appearance of Karliah (especially hair and eyes), then use this version. All it will do is remove the hood (assuming your mod doesn\'t do that already).

\'Natural\' gives her neater hair, and swaps the weird blurple eyes out for standard dunmer eyes (the cool red variant).
This is the version I use and prefer.
author: Karsciyin
